description: Defines the data model for a calendar event, including properties such as id, title, description, start and end times, all-day flag, reminder offset, and creator info. Provides methods for copying, converting to/from map representations.

classes.name: Event
classes.description: Represents a calendar event with optional reminder offset in minutes, including methods for creating modified copies and serialization to/from map objects.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the Event instance with specified fields replaced by new values.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Serializes the Event object into a Map<String, dynamic> suitable for JSON encoding or storage.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: Factory constructor to create an Event instance from a Map<String, dynamic>, parsing date strings into DateTime objects.
